item.title: Issues with fonts
item.description: Answer originally provided by Jack Penzer, Data Scientist The Problem When trying to plot a visualisation (e.g., bigrams), you are greeted with the following error message: Type of error message we may see This is an issue with R being unable to find the appropriate fonts to produce our plot. The Solution- reinstall fonts and restart R session. We need to make sure we have the correct fonts installed on our computers, and also imported into R.
